# Personal dotfiles

|   Component       | Using...       |
|-------------------|----------------|
| Distribution      | Arch/Void      |
| Windows manager   | bspwm          |
| compositor        | Picom (tryone) |
| Bar               | Polybar        |
| Terminal emulator | kitty          |
| Text editor       | Vim            |
